verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> vay-dab-Ber spake יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor saying

דַּבֵּ֞ר <S%H1696><s%> dab-Ber Speak אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all עֲדַ֧ת <S%H5712><s%> 'a-Dat unto all the congregation בְּנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> be-nei- of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel וְאָמַרְתָּ֥ <S%H559><s%> ve-'a-mar-Ta and say אֲלֵהֶ֖ם <S%H413><s%> 'a-le-Hem to קְדֹשִׁ֣ים <S%H6918><s%> ke-do-Shim unto them Ye shall be holy תִּהְי֑וּ <S%H1961><s%> tih-Yu; become כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki for קָד֔וֹשׁ <S%H6918><s%> ka-Doosh, [am] holy אֲנִ֖י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh for I the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-hei-Chem. your God

אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish every man אִמּ֤וֹ <S%H517><s%> im-Mo his mother וְאָבִיו֙ <S%H1><s%> ve-'a-Viv and his father תִּירָ֔אוּ <S%H3372><s%> ti-Ra-'u, Ye shall fear וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et שַׁבְּתֹתַ֖י <S%H7676><s%> shab-be-to-Tai my sabbaths תִּשְׁמֹ֑רוּ <S%H8104><s%> tish-Mo-ru; and keep אֲנִ֖י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I am יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh I [am] the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-hei-Chem. your God

אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- not תִּפְנוּ֙ <S%H6437><s%> tif-Nu Turn אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הָ֣אֱלִילִ֔ים <S%H457><s%> ha-'e-li-Lim, ye not unto idols וֵֽאלֹהֵי֙ <S%H430><s%> ve-lo-Hei gods מַסֵּכָ֔ה <S%H4541><s%> mas-se-Chah, to yourselves molten לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo or תַעֲשׂ֖וּ <S%H6213><s%> ta-'a-Su nor make לָכֶ֑ם la-Chem; אֲנִ֖י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I am יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh I [am] the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-hei-Chem. your God

וְכִ֧י <S%H3588><s%> ve-Chi now when תִזְבְּח֛וּ <S%H2076><s%> tiz-be-Chu And if ye offer זֶ֥בַח <S%H2077><s%> Ze-vach a sacrifice שְׁלָמִ֖ים <S%H8002><s%> she-la-Mim of peace offerings לַיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; unto the LORD לִֽרְצֹנְכֶ֖ם <S%H7522><s%> lir-tzo-ne-Chem it at your own will תִּזְבָּחֻֽהוּ׃ <S%H2076><s%> tiz-ba-Chu-hu. ye shall offer

בְּי֧וֹם <S%H3117><s%> be-Yom the same day זִבְחֲכֶ֛ם <S%H2077><s%> ziv-cha-Chem ye offer יֵאָכֵ֖ל <S%H398><s%> ye-'a-Chel It shall be eaten וּמִֽמָּחֳרָ֑ת <S%H4283><s%> u-mi-mo-cho-Rat; it and on the morrow וְהַנּוֹתָר֙ <S%H3498><s%> ve-han-no-Tar and if ought remain עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- until י֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> Yom day הַשְּׁלִישִׁ֔י <S%H7992><s%> hash-she-li-Shi, until the third בָּאֵ֖שׁ <S%H784><s%> ba-'Esh in the fire יִשָּׂרֵֽף׃ <S%H8313><s%> yis-sa-Ref. it shall be burnt

וְאִ֛ם <S%H518><s%> ve-'Im if הֵאָכֹ֥ל <S%H3605><s%> he-'a-Chol it יֵאָכֵ֖ל <S%H398><s%> ye-'a-Chel And if it be eaten בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> bai-Yom day הַשְּׁלִישִׁ֑י <S%H7992><s%> hash-she-li-Shi; on the third פִּגּ֥וּל <S%H6292><s%> pig-Gul it [is] abominable ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu he לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo not יֵרָצֶֽה׃ <S%H7521><s%> ye-ra-Tzeh. it shall not be accepted

וְאֹֽכְלָיו֙ <S%H398><s%> ve-'o-che-Lav Therefore [every one] that eateth עֲוֹנ֣וֹ <S%H5771><s%> a-vo-No his iniquity יִשָּׂ֔א <S%H5375><s%> yis-Sa, it shall bear כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- קֹ֥דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> Ko-desh the hallowed thing יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD חִלֵּ֑ל <S%H2490><s%> chil-Lel; because he hath profaned וְנִכְרְתָ֛ה <S%H3772><s%> ve-nich-re-Tah shall be cut off הַנֶּ֥פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> han-Ne-fesh and that soul הַהִ֖וא <S%H1931><s%> ha-Hiv he מֵעַמֶּֽיהָ׃ <S%H5971><s%> me-'am-Mei-ha. from among his people

וּֽבְקֻצְרְכֶם֙ <S%H7114><s%> u-ve-kutz-re-Chem And when ye reap אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- קְצִ֣יר <S%H7105><s%> ke-Tzir the harvest אַרְצְכֶ֔ם <S%H776><s%> 'ar-tze-Chem, of your land לֹ֧א <S%H3808><s%> lo nor תְכַלֶּ֛ה <S%H3615><s%> te-chal-Leh thou shalt not wholly reap פְּאַ֥ת <S%H6285><s%> pe-'At the corners שָׂדְךָ֖ <S%H7704><s%> sa-de-Cha of thy field לִקְצֹ֑ר <S%H7614><s%> lik-Tzor; Sheba וְלֶ֥קֶט <S%H3951><s%> ve-Le-ket the gleanings קְצִֽירְךָ֖ <S%H7105><s%> ke-tzi-re-Cha of thy harvest לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo nor תְלַקֵּֽט׃ <S%H3950><s%> te-lak-Ket. neither shalt thou gather

וְכַרְמְךָ֙ <S%H3754><s%> ve-char-me-Cha thy vineyard לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo Nor תְעוֹלֵ֔ל <S%H5953><s%> te-'o-Lel, And thou shalt not glean וּפֶ֥רֶט <S%H6528><s%> u-Fe-ret [every] grape כַּרְמְךָ֖ <S%H3754><s%> kar-me-Cha of thy vineyard לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo nor תְלַקֵּ֑ט <S%H3950><s%> te-lak-Ket; neither shalt thou gather לֶֽעָנִ֤י <S%H6041><s%> le-'a-Ni them for the poor וְלַגֵּר֙ <S%H1616><s%> ve-lag-Ger and stranger תַּעֲזֹ֣ב <S%H5800><s%> ta-'a-Zo thou shalt leave אֹתָ֔ם <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tam, אֲנִ֖י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh God אֱלֹהֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-hei-Chem. your God

לֹ֖א <S%H3808><s%> lo nor תִּגְנֹ֑בוּ <S%H1589><s%> tig-Nou; Ye shall not steal וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- nor תְכַחֲשׁ֥וּ <S%H3584><s%> te-cha-cha-Shu neither deal falsely וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- nor תְשַׁקְּר֖וּ <S%H8266><s%> te-shak-ke-Ru neither lie אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish one בַּעֲמִיתֽוֹ׃ <S%H5997><s%> ba-'a-mi-To. to another

וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- shall not תִשָּׁבְע֥וּ <S%H7650><s%> tish-sha-ve-'U And ye shall not swear בִשְׁמִ֖י <S%H8034><s%> vish-Mi by my name לַשָּׁ֑קֶר <S%H8267><s%> lash-Sha-ker; falsely וְחִלַּלְתָּ֛ <S%H2490><s%> ve-chil-lal-Ta neither shalt thou profane אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- שֵׁ֥ם <S%H8034><s%> shem the name אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha of thy God אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I am יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. I [am] the LORD

לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- nor תַעֲשֹׁ֥ק <S%H6231><s%> ta-'a-Shok Thou shalt not defraud אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- רֵֽעֲךָ֖ <S%H7453><s%> re-'a-Cha thy neighbour וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo nor תִגְזֹ֑ל <S%H1497><s%> tig-Zol; neither rob לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- nor תָלִ֞ין <S%H3885><s%> ta-Lin shall not abide פְּעֻלַּ֥ת <S%H6468><s%> pe-'ul-Lat [him] the wages שָׂכִ֛יר <S%H7916><s%> sa-Chir of him that is hired אִתְּךָ֖ <S%H854><s%> 'it-te-Cha for עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- until בֹּֽקֶר׃ <S%H1242><s%> Bo-ker. with thee all night until the morning

לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- nor תְקַלֵּ֣ל <S%H7043><s%> te-kal-Lel Thou shalt not curse חֵרֵ֔שׁ <S%H2795><s%> che-Resh, the deaf וְלִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> ve-lif-Nei before עִוֵּ֔ר <S%H5787><s%> 'iv-Ver, the blind לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo nor תִתֵּ֖ן <S%H5414><s%> tit-Ten nor put מִכְשֹׁ֑ל <S%H4383><s%> mich-Shol; a stumblingblock וְיָרֵ֥אתָ <S%H3372><s%> ve-ya-Re-ta but shalt fear מֵּאֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <S%H430><s%> me-'e-lo-Hei-cha thy God אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I am יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. I [am] the LORD

לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- no תַעֲשׂ֥וּ <S%H6213><s%> ta-'a-Su Ye shall do עָ֙וֶל֙ <S%H5766><s%> 'a-vel no unrighteousness בַּמִּשְׁפָּ֔ט <S%H4941><s%> bam-mish-Pat, in judgment לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- nor תִשָּׂ֣א <S%H5375><s%> tis-Sa thou shalt not respect פְנֵי־ <S%H6440><s%> fe-nei- the person דָ֔ל <S%H1800><s%> Dal, of the poor וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo nor תֶהְדַּ֖ר <S%H1921><s%> teh-Dar nor honour פְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> pe-Nei the person גָד֑וֹל <S%H1419><s%> ga-Dol; of the mighty בְּצֶ֖דֶק <S%H6664><s%> be-Tze-dek [but] in righteousness תִּשְׁפֹּ֥ט <S%H8199><s%> tish-Pot shalt thou judge עֲמִיתֶֽךָ׃ <S%H5997><s%> 'a-mi-Te-cha. thy neighbour

לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- shall not תֵלֵ֤ךְ <S%H1980><s%> te-Lech go רָכִיל֙ <S%H7400><s%> ra-Chil up and down [as] a talebearer בְּעַמֶּ֔יךָ <S%H5971><s%> be-'am-Mei-cha, among thy people לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo are not תַעֲמֹ֖ד <S%H5975><s%> ta-'a-Mod neither shalt thou stand עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- against דַּ֣ם <S%H1818><s%> dam against the blood רֵעֶ֑ךָ <S%H7453><s%> re-'E-cha; of thy neighbour אֲנִ֖י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I am יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. I [am] the LORD

לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- shall not תִשְׂנָ֥א <S%H8130><s%> tis-Na Thou shalt not hate אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אָחִ֖יךָ <S%H251><s%> 'a-Chi-cha thy brother בִּלְבָבֶ֑ךָ <S%H3824><s%> bil-va-Ve-cha; in thine heart הוֹכֵ֤חַ <S%H3198><s%> ho-Che-ach thou shalt in any wise תּוֹכִ֙יחַ֙ <S%H3198><s%> to-Chi-ach rebuke אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- עֲמִיתֶ֔ךָ <S%H5997><s%> 'a-mi-Te-cha, thy neighbour וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- shall not תִשָּׂ֥א <S%H5375><s%> tis-Sa and not suffer עָלָ֖יו <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lav because חֵֽטְא׃ <S%H2399><s%> Chet. sin

I [am] the LORD

אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- חֻקֹּתַי֮ <S%H2708><s%> chuk-ko-Tai my statutes תִּשְׁמֹרוּ֒ <S%H8104><s%> tish-mo-Ru Ye shall keep בְּהֶמְתְּךָ֙ <S%H929><s%> be-hem-te-Cha Thou shalt not let thy cattle לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- nor תַרְבִּ֣יעַ <S%H7250><s%> tar-Bi-a' gender כִּלְאַ֔יִם <S%H3610><s%> kil-'A-yim, with a diverse kind שָׂדְךָ֖ <S%H7704><s%> sa-de-Cha thy field לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- nor תִזְרַ֣ע <S%H2232><s%> tiz-Ra' thou shalt not sow כִּלְאָ֑יִם <S%H3610><s%> kil-'A-yim; with mingled seed וּבֶ֤גֶד <S%H899><s%> u-Ve-ged neither shall a garment כִּלְאַ֙יִם֙ <S%H3610><s%> kil-'A-yim mingled שַֽׁעַטְנֵ֔ז <S%H8162><s%> sha-'at-Nez, of linen and woollen לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo nor יַעֲלֶ֖ה <S%H5927><s%> ya-'a-Leh come עָלֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lei-cha. and פ Peh

וְ֠אִישׁ <S%H376><s%> Ve-'ish And whosoever כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- now if יִשְׁכַּ֨ב <S%H7901><s%> yish-Kav lieth אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> 'et- with אִשָּׁ֜ה <S%H802><s%> 'ish-Shah with a woman שִׁכְבַת־ <S%H7902><s%> shich-vat- seed זֶ֗רַע <S%H2233><s%> Ze-ra', child וְהִ֤וא <S%H1931><s%> ve-Hiv who שִׁפְחָה֙ <S%H8198><s%> shif-Chah that [is] a bondmaid נֶחֱרֶ֣פֶת <S%H2778><s%> ne-che-Re-fet betrothed לְאִ֔ישׁ <S%H376><s%> le-'Ish, to an husband וְהָפְדֵּה֙ <S%H6299><s%> ve-ha-fe-Deh and not at all לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo no נִפְדָּ֔תָה <S%H6299><s%> nif-Da-tah, redeemed א֥וֹ <S%H176><s%> o and חֻפְשָׁ֖ה <S%H2668><s%> chuf-Shah nor freedom לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo nor נִתַּן־ <S%H5414><s%> nit-tan- given לָ֑הּ Lah; בִּקֹּ֧רֶת <S%H1244><s%> bik-Ko-ret her she shall be scourged תִּהְיֶ֛ה <S%H1961><s%> tih-Yeh become לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo nor יוּמְת֖וּ <S%H4191><s%> yu-me-Tu they shall not be put to death כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- because לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo nor חֻפָּֽשָׁה׃ <S%H2666><s%> chup-Pa-shah. because she was not free
